system.descriptionText:
1. Enemy in Ascendance (100xp): +3 Perception. Gain Paranoia Talent.
2. Haunted by thy own Sins (300xp): Gain Dark Soul, Frenzy, and Flagellant Talents. Gain one Untrained Forbidden Lore Skill. Gain 1d10 Corruption.
3. Tormented by the Unspeakable (200xp): Gain Light Sleeper, Jaded, and Resistance (Fear) Talents. Gain 2d10 Insanity.
